00042 // Precondition:
00043 // Parametre: Sortie& s
00044 // Signification: un flot de sortie
00045 // Valeurs par defaut:
00046 // Contraintes:
00047 // Acces: entree/sortie
00048 // Exception:
00049 // Effets de bord:
00050 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet
00051 //
00052 //
00053 //! Simple appel a: Raccord_distant::printOn(Sortie\& )<br>(+ finl)
00054 /** \return Sortie\&<br>
00055 Signification: le flot de sortie modifie<br>
00056 Contraintes: */
00057 Sortie& Raccord_distant_homogene::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00058 {
00059   Raccord_distant::printOn(s) << finl;
00060   s << (int)1 <<finl;
00061   s << tab_envoi << finl;
00062   s << tab_recep << finl;
00063   s << nom_frontiere_voisine_ << finl;
00064   s << est_initialise_ << finl;
00065   s << e_ << finl;
00066   return s;
00067 }

00072 // Precondition:
00073 // Parametre: Entree& s
00074 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00075 // Valeurs par defaut:
00076 // Contraintes:
00077 // Acces: entree/sortie
00078 // Exception:
00079 // Effets de bord:
00080 // Postcondition:
00081 //
00082 //! Simple appel a: Raccord_distant::readOn(Entree\& )
00083 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00084 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00085 Contraintes: */
00086 Entree& Raccord_distant_homogene::readOn(Entree& s)
00087 {
00088   Raccord_distant::readOn(s) ;
00089   int flag;
00090   s >> flag;
00091   if(flag==1)
00092     {
00093       s >> tab_envoi;
00094       s >> tab_recep;
00095       s >> nom_frontiere_voisine_;
00096       s >> est_initialise_;
00097       s >> e_;
00098     }
00099   return s;
00100 }

00119 //
00120 //! Retourne dans le DoubleTab x la trace sur le raccord distant du DoubleTab y localise aux elements du domaine distant
00121 void Raccord_distant_homogene::trace_elem_distant(const DoubleTab& y, DoubleTab& x) const
00122 {
00123   assert(est_initialise());
00124   const int nb_compo_= y.line_size();
00125 
00126   const IntTab& send_data = Tab_Envoi();
00127   const ArrOfInt& recv_data = Tab_Recep();
00128   const Faces& lesfaces = faces();
00129   const int n1 = send_data.dimension(0);
00130   const int n2 = recv_data.size_array();
00131 
00132 // On dimensionne x si ce n'est pas fait
00133   if (x.size_array()==0 && n2!=0)
00134     x.resize(n2, nb_compo_);
00135   else if (x.dimension(0) != n2)
00136     {
00137       Cerr << "Call to Frontiere::trace_elem with a DoubleTab x not located on boundary faces." << finl;
00138       Process::exit();
00139     }
00140   Schema_Comm schema;
00141   schema.set_send_recv_pe_list(send_pe_list_, recv_pe_list_);
00142   schema.begin_comm();
00143   for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
00144     {
00145       const int pe_dest = send_data(i, 0);
00146       const int face  = send_data(i, 1);
00147       int item = lesfaces.voisin(face,0);
00148       if (item == -1)
00149         item = lesfaces.voisin(face,1);
00150 
00151       for (int j=0; j<nb_compo_; j++)
00152         schema.send_buffer(pe_dest) << y(item,j);
00153     }
00154   schema.echange_taille_et_messages();
00155 
00156   for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
00157     {
00158       const int pe_source = recv_data[i];
00159       for(int j=0; j<nb_compo_; j++)
00160         schema.recv_buffer(pe_source) >> x(i,j);
00161     }
00162   schema.end_comm();
00163 }

00165 //
00166 //! Retourne dans le DoubleTab x la trace sur le raccord distant du DoubleTab y localise aux faces
00167 void Raccord_distant_homogene::trace_face_distant(const DoubleTab& y, DoubleTab& x) const
00168 {
00169   assert(est_initialise());
00170   int n, N = y.line_size();
00171 
00172   const IntTab& send_data = Tab_Envoi();
00173   const ArrOfInt& recv_data = Tab_Recep();
00174   const int n1 = send_data.dimension(0);
00175   const int n2 = recv_data.size_array();
00176 
00177 // On dimensionne x si ce n'est pas fait
00178   if (x.size_array()==0 && n2!=0)
00179     {
00180       if (y.nb_dim() == 2) x.resize(n2, y.dimension(1));
00181       else if (y.nb_dim() == 3) x.resize(n2, y.dimension(1), y.dimension(2));
00182       else if (y.nb_dim() == 4) x.resize(n2, y.dimension(1), y.dimension(2), y.dimension(3));
00183     }
00184 
00185   Schema_Comm schema;
00186   schema.set_send_recv_pe_list(send_pe_list_, recv_pe_list_);
00187   schema.begin_comm();
00188   for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
00189     {
00190       const int pe_dest = send_data(i, 0);
00191       const int face  = num_premiere_face() + send_data(i, 1);
00192       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) schema.send_buffer(pe_dest) << y.addr()[N * face + n];
00193     }
00194   schema.echange_taille_et_messages();
00195   for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
00196     {
00197       const int pe_source = recv_data[i];
00198       for (n = 0; n < N; n++) schema.recv_buffer(pe_source) >> x.addr()[N * i + n];
00199     }
00200   schema.end_comm();
00201 }
00202 
00203 //
00204 //! Retourne dans le DoubleVect x la trace sur le raccord distant du DoubleVect y localise aux faces du raccord distant
00205 void Raccord_distant_homogene::trace_face_distant(const DoubleVect& y, DoubleVect& x) const
00206 {
00207 // Verifie que l'on passe bien un tableau aux faces du raccord
00208   assert(y.size()==nb_faces());
00209   assert(est_initialise());
00210   const IntTab& send_data = Tab_Envoi();
00211   const ArrOfInt& recv_data = Tab_Recep();
00212   const int n1 = send_data.dimension(0);
00213   const int n2 = recv_data.size_array();
00214 
00215 // On dimensionne x si ce n'est pas fait
00216   if (x.size_array()==0 && n2!=0)
00217     x.resize(n2);
00218 
00219   Schema_Comm schema;
00220   schema.set_send_recv_pe_list(send_pe_list_, recv_pe_list_);
00221   schema.begin_comm();
00222   for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
00223     {
00224       const int pe_dest = send_data(i, 0);
00225       const int face  = send_data(i, 1);
00226       schema.send_buffer(pe_dest) << y(face);
00227     }
00228   schema.echange_taille_et_messages();
00229   for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
00230     {
00231       const int pe_source = recv_data[i];
00232       schema.recv_buffer(pe_source) >> x(i);
00233     }
00234   schema.end_comm();
00235 }
00236 
00237 void Raccord_distant_homogene::completer()
00238 {
00239   const IntTab& send_data = Tab_Envoi();
00240   const ArrOfInt& recv_data = Tab_Recep();
00241   const int n1 = send_data.dimension(0);
00242   const int n2 = recv_data.size_array();
00243   send_pe_list_.set_smart_resize(1);
00244   recv_pe_list_.set_smart_resize(1);
00245   const int nbproc = Process::nproc();
00246   ArrOfBit flags(nbproc);
00247   flags = 0;
00248   for (int i = 0; i < n1; i++)
00249     {
00250       const int pe = send_data(i, 0);
00251       if (!flags.testsetbit(pe))
00252         send_pe_list_.append_array(pe);
00253     }
00254   flags = 0;
00255   for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
00256     {
00257       const int pe = recv_data[i];
00258       if (!flags.testsetbit(pe))
00259         recv_pe_list_.append_array(pe);
00260     }
00261   send_pe_list_.ordonne_array();
00262   recv_pe_list_.ordonne_array();
00263 }
00264 
00265 //
00266 //! Initialise le raccord distant avec la frontiere et la zone discretisee opposees au raccord distant, et la zone discretisee du raccord distant
00267 void Raccord_distant_homogene::initialise(const Frontiere& opposed_boundary, const Zone_dis_base& opposed_zone_dis, const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis)
00268 {
00269   Raccord_distant_homogene& raccord_distant = *this;
00270   if(raccord_distant.est_initialise())
00271     {
00272       Cerr << "Remote connection " << raccord_distant.le_nom() << " already initialized." << finl;
00273       Cerr << "Error, contact TRUST support." << finl;
00274       exit();
00275     }
00276   int dim=Objet_U::dimension;
00277   raccord_distant.nom_frontiere_voisine()=opposed_boundary.le_nom();
00278   const Zone_VF& zone_dis_vf = ref_cast(Zone_VF, zone_dis);
00279 // On va identifier les faces par leur centres de gravite
00280   int parts = Process::nproc();
00281   DoubleTabs remote_xv(parts);
00282   int prem_face2 = raccord_distant.num_premiere_face();
00283   int nb_face2   = raccord_distant.nb_faces();
00284   int moi = Process::me();
00285   remote_xv[moi].resize(nb_face2,dim);
00286   for (int ind_face=0 ; ind_face < nb_face2 ; ind_face++)
00287     {
00288       int face = prem_face2 + ind_face;
00289       for (int j=0 ; j<dim ; j++)
00290         remote_xv[moi](ind_face,j) = zone_dis_vf.xv(face,j);
00291     }
00292 
00293 // Puis on echange les tableaux des centres de gravites
00294 // envoi des tableaux
00295   for (int p = 0; p < parts; p++)
00296     envoyer_broadcast(remote_xv[p], p);
00297 
00298   VECT(ArrOfInt) racc_vois(parts);
00299   for (int p = 0; p < parts; p++)
00300     racc_vois[p].set_smart_resize(1);
00301 
00302 #ifdef MEDCOUPLING_
00303 // On traite les informations, chaque proc connait tous les XV
00304 // Si le proc porte un morceau du raccord_distant
00305   int prem_face1 = opposed_boundary.num_premiere_face();
00306   int nb_face1   = opposed_boundary.nb_faces();
00307   if (nb_face1>0)
00308     {
00309       const Zone_VF& opposed_zone_dis_vf = ref_cast(Zone_VF,opposed_zone_dis);
00310       const DoubleTab& local_xv = opposed_zone_dis_vf.xv();
00311 
00312       ArrOfInt& Recep=raccord_distant.Tab_Recep();
00313       Recep.resize_array(nb_face1);
00314 // double tolerance = 1e-8; //not very tolerant, are we?
00315       double tolerance = Objet_U::precision_geom * 100 ; //default value 1e-8 not very tolerant, are we?
00316 
00317 // DataArrayDoubles des xv locaux et de tous les remote_xv (a la suite)
00318       std::vector<MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> > vxv(parts);
00319       std::vector<const DataArrayDouble*> cvxv(parts);
00320       for (int p = 0; p < parts; p++)
00321         {
00322           vxv[p] = DataArrayDouble::New();
00323           vxv[p]->useExternalArrayWithRWAccess(remote_xv[p].addr(), remote_xv[p].dimension(0), remote_xv[p].dimension(1));
00324           cvxv[p] = vxv[p];
00325         }
00326       MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> remote_xvs(DataArrayDouble::Aggregate(cvxv)), local_xvs(DataArrayDouble::New());
00327       local_xvs->alloc(nb_face1, dim);
00328       for (int ind_face = 0; ind_face < nb_face1; ind_face++) for (int j = 0; j < dim; j++)
00329           local_xvs->setIJ(ind_face, j, local_xv(prem_face1 + ind_face, j));
00330 
00331 // indices des points de remote_xvs les plus proches de chaque point de local_xv
00332       MCAuto<DataArrayInt> glob_idx(DataArrayInt::New());
00333 
00334       glob_idx = remote_xvs->findClosestTupleId(local_xvs);
00335 
00336 // pour chaque face de local_xv : controle de la tolerance, remplissage de tableau
00337       for (int ind_face = 0, face1 = prem_face1; ind_face<nb_face1; ind_face++, face1++)
00338         {
00339 // retour de l'indice global (glob_idx(ind_face)) au couple (proc, ind_face2)
00340           int proc = 0, ind_face2 = glob_idx->getIJ(ind_face, 0);
00341           while (ind_face2 >= remote_xv[proc].dimension(0)) ind_face2 -= remote_xv[proc].dimension(0), proc++;
00342           assert(ind_face2 < remote_xv[proc].dimension(0));
00343 
00344 // controle de la tolerance
00345           double distance2 = 0;
00346           for (int j=0; j<dim; j++)
00347             {
00348               double x1=local_xv(face1,j);
00349               double x2=remote_xv[proc](ind_face2,j);
00350               distance2 += (x1-x2)*(x1-x2);
00351             }
00352           if (distance2 > tolerance * tolerance)
00353             {
00354               Cerr << "Warning, there is no remote face found on the local boundary " << opposed_boundary.le_nom() << " for the face local number " << ind_face << " (";
00355               for (int j=0; j<dim; j++) Cerr << " " << local_xv(face1,j);
00356               Cerr << " )" << finl << "the nearest face on the remote boundary " << raccord_distant.le_nom() << " is the face " << ind_face2 << " (";
00357               for (int j=0; j<dim; j++) Cerr << " " << remote_xv[proc](ind_face2,j);
00358               Cerr << " )" << finl << "which is located at a distance of " << sqrt(distance2) << " and it is above the geometric tolerance " << tolerance << finl;
00359               Cerr << "Check your mesh or contact TRUST support." << finl;
00360               Process::exit();
00361             }
00362 
00363 // remplissage des tableaux
00364           Recep(ind_face)=proc;
00365           racc_vois[proc].append_array(ind_face2);
00366         }
00367     }
00368 #else
00369   Cerr<<"Raccord_distant_homogene needs TRUST compiled with MEDCoupling."<<finl;
00370   exit();
00371 #endif
00372   VECT(ArrOfInt) facteurs(Process::nproc());
00373   envoyer_all_to_all(racc_vois, facteurs);
00374 
00375   IntTab& Envoi = raccord_distant.Tab_Envoi();
00376   if (nb_face2 > 0)
00377     Envoi.resize(nb_face2, 2);
00378   int ind = 0;
00379   for (int p = 0; p < parts; p++)
00380     {
00381       const ArrOfInt& facteur = facteurs[p];
00382       const int sz = facteur.size_array();
00383       for (int d=0 ; d<sz ; d++)
00384         {
00385           Envoi(ind,0) = p;
00386           Envoi(ind,1) = facteur(d);
00387           ind++;
00388         }
00389     }
00390   raccord_distant.e() = 0;
00391   raccord_distant.est_initialise() = 1;
00392   raccord_distant.completer();
00393   Cerr <<"Initialize the remote connection " << zone_dis.zone().domaine().le_nom() << "/" << raccord_distant.le_nom() << "<-" << opposed_zone_dis.zone().domaine().le_nom() << "/" << opposed_boundary.le_nom() << finl;
00394 }
